messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Christmas Cheer link
messages.msgSnippet: Yeah,  thanks Deb! Check out the message in a bottle ones.  lol! http://www.icq.com/friendship/pages/browse_page_18964.php My dd and I are cracking up.  LOL
messages.messageBody:
Yeah, thanks Deb!

Check out the message in a bottle ones. lol!

http://www.icq.com/friendship/pages/browse_page_18964.php

My dd and I are cracking up. LOL

Kelli~

Brenda Rose <rosebl@...> wrote:
Deb,

Thanks for posting this! Being somewhat random myself, I clicked on the
deer in a random order. What a delight!
My fave was the rather unusual one at the end, but then I think the dogs'
Jingle Bells is a holiday classic.

Brenda

Deb,
